price: ሶላትንም በቀን ጫፎች ከሌሊትም ክፍሎች ፈጽም፡፡ መልካም ሥራዎች ኀጢአቶችን ያስወገድዳሉና፡፡ ይህ ለተገሳጮች ግሳጼ ነው፡፡
arabic: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَيِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqimi al-ṣalata ṭarafayi al-nahāri wazulafan mina al-layli inna al-ḥasanāti yudh'hib'na al-sayiāti dhālika dhik'rā lildhākirīna
